summary: The customer is looking to upgrade their phone with Contoso Wireless. The agent informed the customer that they have the Contoso Wireless X phone in stock and provided them with the specs. They also explained that all of their phones come with a one-year manufacturer's warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee, as well as several accessories available for purchase. The customer can also upgrade their existing plan when they purchase the phone, and it can be shipped out today and should arrive within 3-5 business days.
